57997.<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「い: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>What in the world was that!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57999.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ご: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>A good day to you, everyone of Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58000.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...With eternal night comes the Witch Gretzel <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58007.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ク:

58029.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だ:

58032.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「気:
